sentence: Breakfast is good large variety and reasonably priced
This was rated as a five star hotel but did not meet that grade for us
Reasonably price for spa treatment in 5 stars hotel in Bali the environment is really calming and good skilled therapist
Prices are reasonable for a 5 star experience and I would surely consider another visit to this part of Bali
we come here once a year and if you keep watch on the prices you can get great deals as prices are always changing

Reasonably priced toTwo pools to choose from and the infinity pool is amazing with a view to die for though the water is very warm from the direct sun so if you actually want to cool off as we did use the ground floor pool which was gorgeously refreshing
The coffee was deliciously strong and it was no extra charge for cappuccino latte machiato you name it

Comfortable rooms with lots of little extras provided such as charged torch next to bed mosquito repellent razor shaving cream etc in fact all one needs is deodorant which one can purchase from nearby shops
Tjakra 7friendly price with great treatmenthowever in overall strongly recommend Pullman Bali
And a cocktail of the day at a reasonable price

There was a problem between the hotel and the travel but the receptionist did not help at all instead asking me to move out from the room I have paid and showed them the bill but they treated me like that
The novelty did wear off when you realise what you can order outside of the hotel for almost half the price though
We paid 400 for basically a 1 12day stay which was our choice but the experience was not one worth remembering unfortunately
After upgrading our room for an additional cost I thought I was in a different hotel much better
I booked and paid a sea view premier suite but was given a musky room with no proper lighting in the middle of the resort
I do love to order room service and spend the night in sometimes but the food was not worth the high price
Property has an area to chill freshen up charge your phone watch tv if you already check out but you have a late flight
We have paid a lot less on this trip for other acomodation and it has been a lot better then the Pullman which we paid top dollar for
but had to leave to pay the bilthis left a bad taste as we were checking out the next morning and would pay balance then
so not a good start paying over 20aud
